Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle, rising to sharp turn, of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light brown. Circular stamp with Helios head symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Timagoras. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0219.31.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (261)
